courses.name: Introduction to Principles and Techniques of Data Science
Ethics of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence
Search and Planning in Artificial Intelligence
Statistical Methods for Learning and Data Mining

content.title: Machine Learning with Andrew Ng, Stanford University
content.desc: Universally recommended machine learning lectures by Andrew Ng, for beginner and intermediate level machine learning.

content.title: Elements of AI
content.desc: Free online course made by the University of Helsinki and Reaktor.

content.title: Neural Networks: Zero to Hero with Andrej Karpathy
content.desc: A comprehensive educational resource that guides viewers from the basics of neural networks to more advanced concepts, showcasing practical examples and intuitive explanations. The series is known for its clear, engaging teaching style, making complex topics accessible to beginners and those looking to deepen their understanding of deep learning.

content.title: Reinforcement Learning with David Silver
content.desc: Older but popular lecture series by lead DeepMind researcher David Silver at King’s College London.  Follows along with the first edition of Introduction to RL by Sutton and Barto.

content.title: Deep Learning and Reinforcement Learning Summer School 2018
content.desc: These are the lecture videos from the 2018 DLRL summer school, held by CIFAR, Amii, and the Vector Institute in Toronto.  The DLRL summer school is pretty competitive, but the lectures actually vary from introductory to advanced.  Links to the slides are also included on the video pages.

presentations.title: Welcome to UAIS
presentations.name: Justin Stevens
presentations.desc: Introduction of the club and various subfields of AI.

presentations.title: Image Classifiers
presentations.name: Justin Stevens
presentations.desc: Introduction to image classifiers using the MNIST dataset, using tensorflow with Keras, and gradient descent.

presentations.title: Alpha Go
presentations.name: Martin Müller
presentations.desc: Presentation from Dr.Müller talking about Alpha Go.

presentations.title: Python Workshop
presentations.name: Giancarlo Pernudi Segura
presentations.desc: Workshop for those who are new to Python or looking for some special. tips.

presentations.title: Python Environments
presentations.name: Paul Saunders & Giancarlo Pernudi Segura
presentations.desc: Online videos showing a basic introduction to python environments.

presentations.title: Advanced Architectures - AIMSS AI course
presentations.name: Giancarlo Pernudi Segura
presentations.desc: An overview of CNNs, RNNs, NLP, RL & and their applications in medicine.

etc.title: Compiled r/MachineLearning Links
etc.desc: This is a compilation of links created by the Machine Learning subreddit on reddit, containing various free resources
